issue.title: [CF 1417] TellMeWhen not showing
issue.body:
TMW is not showing on any Character, when I type /tmw nothing happens. the addon is loaded in the addon tab. not sure how to fix this. Please help!!


> Posted by CurseForge user Bladestorm05 | Imported from CurseForge issue #1417 | Raw

comments.body:
And typing /tmw options doesn't bring up the main options?


> Posted by CurseForge user Cybeloras

I'm experiencing this exact same problem.  Addon was working fine a few days ago and suddenly it's not.  I type /tmw and nothing happens.  The addon appears in my Interface Addon list without the config button, just says Tell Me When v8.4.0.  In game the addon on the list says "loadable on demand".  /load tmw with no results.  plz help!

 

***update*** I figured out what the problem was.  I had just downloaded Twitch and had the setting of "Install Libraries Separately" checked.  Un-checked this, reinstalled and Tell Me When is up and running!  So far so good!

Edited Jul 21, 2017

> Posted by CurseForge user amyu
